la2khealth18.Description: 18. Have you gained or lose more than 20 pounds in the last year"

la2khealth10.Description: 10. Asthma, emphysema, tuberculosis, pleurisy or other diseases of the lungs"

la2khealth19.Description: 19. Are you actively at work at least 20 hours per week"

la2khealth1.Description: 1. Heart or Artery disease including heart attack, stroke, aneurysm, arteriosclerosis, chest pain, rheumatic, fever or heart murmur"

la2khealth8.Description: 8. Ulcer, colitis, difficulty swallowing, stomach problems, hernia or rectal problems"

la2khealth6.Description: 6. AIDS, AIDS-related complex or other immune deficiency disorders, infections or chronic infection problems"

la2khealth14.Description: 14. Any other medical condition that has not been disclosed above"

la2khealth15.Description: 15. Have you smoked in the last 2 year"

la2khealth7.Description: 7. Alcohol or substance abuse, mental/nervous disorders"

la2khealth17.Description: 17. Are you taking any medication (except antibiotics or contraceptives)that require a prescription by a physician"

la2khealth14s.Description: 14s. If so, describe in detail here.

bmi.Description: BMI calculated using formula based on pounds

la2khealth21.Description: 21. Have you been told that it may be necessary to be admitted to the hospital or have surgery in the future"

la2khealth9.Description: 9. Diabetes, cystic fibrosis, albumin or sugar in the urine or other endocrine problems"

la2khealth4.Description: 4. Diseases of the kidney, liver, gall bladder, pancreas, or male/female organs including venereal disease"

la2khealth11.Description: 11. Paralysis, epilepsy, M.S. or other neuromuscular disorder"

la2khealth_score.Description: Sum of Items 1-21 for Total Health Score.
